articles.title: China's 'robot Olympics' sees humanoids from 16 nations compete in table tennis, football, track
articles.summary: China kicked off a three-day long sports showcase for humanoid robots on Friday, looking to highlight progress in artificial intelligence and robotics with 280 teams from 16 countries competing in the World Humanoid Robot Games.
articles.translated_title: China's 'robot Olympics' sees humanoids from 16 nations compete in table tennis, football, track
articles.translated_summary: China kicked off a three-day long sports showcase for humanoid robots on Friday, looking to highlight progress in artificial intelligence and robotics with 280 teams from 16 countries competing in the World Humanoid Robot Games.

articles.title: Hedge funds shift bets to double down on Big Tech amid AI boom
articles.summary: Wall Street's largest hedge funds, Bridgewater Associates, Tiger Global Management and Discovery Capital, increased their exposure to Big Tech in the second quarter amid a generational boom in the growth of artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Hedge funds shift bets to double down on Big Tech amid AI boom
articles.translated_summary: Wall Street's largest hedge funds, Bridgewater Associates, Tiger Global Management and Discovery Capital, increased their exposure to Big Tech in the second quarter amid a generational boom in the growth of artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Masayoshi Son‚Äôs Fortune Jumps $9 Billion in Two Weeks on AI Bets
articles.summary: In the first two weeks of August alone, Masayoshi Son has added $9 billion to his fortune as SoftBank Group Corp.‚Äôs artificial intelligence bets sent its shares to record highs. That‚Äôs put Son‚Äôs wealth firmly back on the upswing after years of turbulence.

articles.title: Silicon Valley Parents Are Spending $50,000 to Screen Embryos for IQ
articles.summary: Some tech CEOs are hoping that their children will be intelligent enough to regulate the artificial intelligence being developed in their very own industry.
articles.translated_title: Silicon Valley Parents Are Spending $50,000 to Screen Embryos for IQ

articles.title: New report finds AI could displace about 7% of the American workforce
articles.summary: New analysis from Goldman Sachs economists estimated that artificial intelligence might not lead to widespread job losses some fear.

articles.title: AI Cash Boon Might Grease Way for Universal Income
articles.summary: With artificial intelligence (AI) rendering more and more jobs obsolete, some tech titans in Silicon Valley say the solution lies in giving everyone a universal basic income (UBI).
articles.translated_title: AI Cash Boon Might Grease Way for Universal Income
articles.translated_summary: With artificial intelligence (AI) rendering more and more jobs obsolete, some tech titans in Silicon Valley say the solution lies in giving everyone a universal basic income (UBI).

articles.title: Margaret Boden, Philosopher of Artificial Intelligence, Dies at 88
articles.summary: A cognitive scientist, she used the language of computers to explore the nature of human thought and creativity, offering prescient insights about A.I.

articles.title: Tiger cub hedge fund Coatue Management unveils new position in Oracle, doubles down on AI buildout
articles.summary: The investor doubled down on key artificial intelligence beneficiaries such as Nvidia and Microsoft as the tech rally came back with a fury in the second quarter.
